name: Ravesta Racing
description:
★★★ All The Best Racing Music & Video Game! for a Low Low Price! ★★★
★★★ Ravesta Racing! Get behind the wheels and race against 2-9 other players in this multiplayer racing game, Race devious opponents through a comprehensive 'Online' mode. Also Enjoy a multitude of Music Exclusive by Ravesta Records.Exclusively licensed by Ravesta Records.

Created by 1 Developer
from the creator of Ravesta Racing says: I work on these games as my passion all day every when I can and it's my goal to make them 100% perfect so just a positive review, constructive criticism and communication with me, will help further development for it. Thank you all so much for the support of this game.

★★★ KEY FEATURES ★★★
Ray-Tracing Enabled
Unique Soundtrack for Racing perfect almost makes the experience.
Top Graphics & Lighting
Auto/manual Gear Switch
race mode against 2-9 other players.
customize car paint
4 maps at launch of release
always updated with new content and improvements every week

Featuring the following DJ & Producers
- DJ FIXX
- ONDAMIKE
- DJ EKL
- DJ MARK VEE
- TONE ABSTRACT
& MORE!
